body:
25% Overview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YOC_N7X2U8c&feature=youtu.be
Origin: https://oc.tc/forums/topics/518d6375a87858b5770014d9
Uses:
 - UHC
 - Avicus / OCN
 - SG
 - Soup (No Buffs)
 - Enchanted fights
 - Factions
Features:
 - Lagless Low Fire
 - Unique Crosshair
 - UHC Dark rock based blocks
 - Unique Particles
 - Lagless Sky
 - Optifine Compatible 
 - Light Colormap
 - Unique Lighting
 - Unique Swords
 - Unique Tools
 - Unique Armor

CREDITS:

Vattic - for the original Faithful 32x32 Pack, 
which makes up the vast majority of this texturepack

Freyr29 - for the original clear GUI

MK325 - for the color-coded bow textures

TheXyrin - for the reticule and reduced fire

BenBrez - for the hunger bar

MrM00se - for the thin swords

Tethius - for the potion designs

Eum3 - for the following:
 - pumpkin GUI
 - updated clear GUI
 - better hotbar icons
 - compilation
 - updates
 - lots of minor fixes and changes

Phyre - for the following:
 - UHC Optimized blocks
 - Avicus / OCN Optimized Build
 - VIP Bow
 - Re-Edited Swords
 - VIP GUI
 - Re-Edited Fishing Rod
 - Re-Edited Flint and steel
 - Potion PvP Optimized Low Fire
 - Bug Fixes
 - 1.7 + 1.8 GUI Combo
 - Lighting
 - Updated Clear GUI
 - Updated Hotbar
 - Cursor Edit
 - Grey Heart edit
 - Re-Edited Bow

SolrFlare - Sky

[Standard + Sound] DL V1.0: https://www.mediafire.com/?73z88zn4ko776y2
 Updated to the latest version as of now.
 1.7 + 1.8 (All bugs and blocks fixed)
[Shader Optimized] DL V1.0:
[Lite] DL V1.0:

replies.body: I recommend you make it a .zip file, you know, so I can look at the textures xD.

replies.body:
Oh sorry, for some reason it opened with paint.. Sorry =P.

Other than that, very nice resource pack! I personally dont like it, but thats just because I despise faithful =P. Very nice PvP pack tho, faithful is by far the best way to go if you want something 32x32 or more. Sometimes other packs get confusing.
